channel.title: --> Need Help putting 614 Online <--
channel.description: Okay, i've searched all over this Source and there is NO WHERE. to change the ip, i have ctrl + F the files, for all ip's like: 0.0.0.0 /127.0.0.1/no-ip There is no where, if anyone knows the file name which you change for this can you please tell me, i will be most greatful thankyou.

item.title: --> Need Help putting 614 Online <--
item.dc:creator: @Smudgerx360 Smudgerx360
item.description:
@Smudgerx360 wrote:

I dont understand, before in 317 i just added no-ip, started the server, then closed no-ip down, and it still ran, why do i need local host and they need my ip? i dont understand…

so i need to add my current Ip here?
but where abouts? mark it with 127.0.0.1

if (string.equals("jagex.com") || string.endsWith(".jagex.com")) return true; if (string.equals("runescape.com") || string.endsWith(".runescape.com")) return true; if (i < 89) getDocumentBase(); if (string.equals("stellardawn.com") || string.endsWith(".stellardawn.com")) return true; if (string.endsWith("spawnscape614.no-ip.info")) return true; for (/**/; (string.length() > 0 && string.charAt(string.length() - 1) >= '0' && string.charAt(string.length() + -1) <= '9'); string = string.substring(0, -1 + string.length())) { /* empty */ } if (string.endsWith("spawnscape614.no-ip.info")) return true; if(string.equals("spawnscape614.no-ip.info")) return true; if (string.equals("")) return true; // method81(-17312, "invalidhost"); return true; }

but i still dont understand why they need my ip

Read full topic

item.title: --> Need Help putting 614 Online <--
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You need to connect using localhost, he needs to connect using your IP found here

Read full topic

item.title: --> Need Help putting 614 Online <--
item.dc:creator: @Smudgerx360 Smudgerx360
item.description:
@Smudgerx360 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:522349”][quote author=Smudgerx360 link=topic=640855.msg4317858#msg4317858 date=1371781217]

Most sources don’t need an IP. It’s the client that does.

Well, in Certain files i have changed the IP and when i try to join, it dosent let me play online,
Files ive changed IP of the client:

Applet_Sub1.java
Settings.java
Launch.java

Have I missed any if you know it wont connect if i run No-ip and the runserver.bat, so i turn off the no-ip and leave the runserver.bat running, it still wont connect :(?

If you turn off no-ip, then your no ip wont work. It doesn’t block localhost.

So i need to run them both @ Same time?
[/quote]
Yes. If you want others to connect using no-ip[/quote]

me and my friend just tried, even i cant connect?

Read full topic

item.title: --> Need Help putting 614 Online <--

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well, in Certain files i have changed the IP and when i try to join, it dosent let me play online,
Files ive changed IP of the client:

Applet_Sub1.java
Settings.java
Launch.java

Have I missed any if you know it wont connect if i run No-ip and the runserver.bat, so i turn off the no-ip and leave the runserver.bat running, it still wont connect :(?

If you turn off no-ip, then your no ip wont work. It doesn’t block localhost.
[/quote]

So i need to run them both @ Same time?[/quote]
Yes. If you want others to connect using no-ip
